nodes.text: The Four-and-a-Half was a cantina in Cloud City during the Galactic Civil War. Straddling levels 124 and 125 in Port Town, there was no official record that it existed, and it was illegal to enter it. Sabacc, mynock fights, hintaro, and dejarik could be found in the establishment. Yawrocca was considered the reigning dejarik champion of the cantina.
